citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30pm on 9-AUG-
2023. The inspector spoke to a family member who stated that the Licensee was not home, the Licensee would not be
home until the evening, and there were no facility representatives available for an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30pm on 9-AUG-
2023. The inspector spoke to a family member who stated that the Licensee was not home, the Licensee would not be 
home until the evening, and there were no facility representatives available for an inspection. 
 
 
End Section
